TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapFaultBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

Docs.summary: Represents an extensibility element added to a within an XML Web service.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class specifies the contents of any SOAP error message returned.
For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapFaultBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding/CPP/soapfaultbinding.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapFaultBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding/CS/soapfaultbinding.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapFaultBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding/VB/soapfaultbinding.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes an instance of the class.
Gets or sets a URI representing the encoding style used to encode the SOAP fault message.
Docs.value: A string containing a URI. The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format:
## Remarks The value of this property should be set only if the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapFaultBinding.Use%2A> property is `Encoded`.
## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapFaultBinding_ctor#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding_ctor/CPP/soapfaultbinding_ctor.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[SoapFaultBinding_ctor#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding_ctor/CS/soapfaultbinding_ctor.cs#4)] [!code-vb[SoapFaultBinding_ctor#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding_ctor/VB/soapfaultbinding_ctor.vb#4)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value of the name attribute that relates the soap fault to the wsdl fault defined for the specified operation.
Docs.value: A object that contains the name attribute that relates the soap fault to the wsdl fault defined for the operation.

Docs.summary: Get or sets the URI representing the location of the specification for encoding of content not specifically defined by the property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property will return an empty string ("") if the property value has not been set. The value should only be set if the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapFaultBinding.Use%2A> property is `Encoded`. Otherwise the XML Web service will exhibit unexpected behavior.
## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapFaultBinding_ctor#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding_ctor/CPP/soapfaultbinding_ctor.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[SoapFaultBinding_ctor#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding_ctor/CS/soapfaultbinding_ctor.cs#5)] [!code-vb[SoapFaultBinding_ctor#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapFaultBinding_ctor/VB/soapfaultbinding_ctor.vb#5)]

Docs.summary: Specifies whether the fault message is encoded using rules specified by the property, or is encapsulated within a concrete XML schema.
Docs.value: One of the values. The default is .
